index.in-this-section: In this section, you can add the children you would like to renew for by selecting the "Renew a child" button.
index.each-child: Each child must have a client number to renew their membership. If the child does not have a client number, you will need to apply for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
index.dental-insurance-title: Access to other dental insurance or coverage
index.dental-benefit-has-access: Has access to the following benefits:

modal.info: Do you want to remove {{childName}} from this application?

information.form-instructions-sin: Enter the child's name as it was provided when you first applied for the child.
information.single-legal-name: If the child has a single legal name
information.name-instructions: If the child uses only one legal name, enter it in both the first and last name fields.
information.client-number-detail: You can find the child’s client number in the upper right corner of the renewal letter from Service Canada or on the child’s Canadian Dental Care Plan member card.
information.parent-legend: Are you the parent or legal guardian of this child?

child-not-found.heading: We could not find your child's application with the information you gave us.
child-not-found.please-review: Please make sure the information you entered for your child is correct.
child-not-found.contact-service-canada: Contact Service Canada if this issue continues by calling <noWrap>1-833-537-4342</noWrap>.

error-message.date-of-birth-day-required: Date of birth must include a day
error-message.date-of-birth-is-past: Date of birth must be in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-is-past-valid: Date of birth too far in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-month-required: Date of birth must include a month
error-message.date-of-birth-valid: Day must be valid for the given month and year
error-message.date-of-birth-year-number: Year must be a number, for example 1950
error-message.date-of-birth-year-required: Date of birth must include a year
error-message.client-number-valid: Must be a valid client number. Your input must be 11 or 13 digits long.
error-message.is-parent: Select whether you are the parent or legal guardian of the child
error-message.characters-valid: Only letters, numbers and the following characters are accepted: apostrophe ('), comma (,), period (.), hyphen (-) and bracket ()
error-message.first-name-no-digits: First name must contain letters only
error-message.last-name-no-digits: Last name must contain letters only
